title: PlayStation VR 2 Revealed! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 01.05.22
description:
Go to http://upstart.com/kindafunny to find out how Upstart can lower your monthly rate.

Go to http://buyraycon.com/kindafunny to get 15% off your Raycon order.

Go to http://expressvpn.com/kindafunny to get 3 months free on a 1-year package.

Janet and Andy break down the PSVR 2 reveal, the new Horizon VR game, Ubisoft Plus coming to Xbox, and more!

Time Codes - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:33 - Housekeeping
If you like all the PlayStation News you’re getting today, remember that a new episode of PS I Love You XOXO is live and all about us predicting PlayStation’s 2022.
We JUST dropped a new line of merch on kindafunny.com/store, and it’s HOT.
This Friday we’re going to be live all day on Twitch.tv/kindafunnygames to celebrate 7 years of Kinda Funny. Tune in for Mario Party shenanigans and pure chaos right after KFGD this Friday.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: James Davis (@JamesDavisMakes), Black Jack, & Pranksy
The Roper Report   -
00:07:00 - Sony Confirms its Next VR Headset is Called 'PSVR 2' - Taylor Lyles @ IGN https://www.ign.com/articles/psvr-2-name-reveal-new-game-reveal
00:22:40 - Horizon Call of the Mountain has been revealed for PlayStation VR2 - PS Blog - Trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yPNn-jwAC9c
00:35:20 - Ubisoft+ Coming To Xbox And Rainbow Six Extraction Launching On Xbox Game Pass
00:46:26 -  Ad
00:49:20 - Ghost of Tsushima has sold 8 million copies - Jeff Grubb at Games Beat https://venturebeat.com/2022/01/04/ghost-of-tsushima-has-sold-8-million-copies/
00:56:40 - Discord seems to be preparing for PSN integration by Hirun Cryer @ Games Radar https://www.gamesradar.com/discord-seems-to-be-preparing-for-psn-integration/
00:59:59 - Out today
01:03:10 - You‘re Wrong
